participant_1.background:
I'm single now, but my longest relationship lasted for three years.
I will continue to share my love of comic books and animals with others through my blog.
I couldn't be a school teacher like my father because I'm blind.
sometimes i wish i didn t have to wake up in the morning.
I'm still exploring my cultural heritage.

participant_2.background:
I have moved a lot in my life, but I have found it to be a great way to learn about new places and cultures.
my favorite food is a cheeseburger.
I am an only child, so I have to make my own fun.
i drink a lot of caffeine.
My relationship with my boss is still in its early stages.

content.text: I'm doing well! Just hanging out, how about you?
I'm doing good! I'm just getting ready for work.
Oh, what do you do for work?
I'm a teacher. I love working with kids.
That sounds really fun! I'm a blogger, so I get to work from home and share my love of comic books and animals with others.
That sounds really cool! I love comic books too!
Cool! What's your favorite comic book?
Me too! They're my favorite too!
That's awesome! We should be friends!
